documents.document: I mean, she wrote about trolls in dungeons. Makes sense she is an A+ troll hunter herself. https://t.co/O6WhsSn66U
My favourite thing about the protests in the UK is that over there trump means fart.
The @NatGeo insta stories has been all pandas all day and I am loving it ðŸ¼
Bakers of the world. Can't we all agree to use the metric system? It just makes sense.
Matilda's favourite new thing is to sit in the hallway and stare at the vacuum cleaner. As if I needed a reminder of my domestic failings.
@Hazelbird ooo do you make the dumplings or buy them? I've never tried tempeh!
Kind of going off the taste/texture of meat. Hit me with your favourite vegetarian recipes! (No weird meat replacements though...)
Also...the scar on his cheek from Princess Eugenie...haha
Teething level: chewing mum's forehead and nose. Shouldn't humans just be born with teeth and be done with it?
Hoping this is the start of awesome art. Protest songs was my favourite part of the history curriculum at school.
Let's be the sand in the gears for the next four years https://t.co/lrm6Y8i2yi
@Styla73 @Hazelbird I hate it. This is the age of binge watching! Give me, like, the next 10 years of your material all at once please John!
Teething is no joke. Imagine having a bunch of sharp things piercing your skin from the inside, and you can't tell anyone what's wrong.
@Styla73 everyone keeps saying they just cry the whole way through this show, and I feel I need to not be a big bag of hormones to watch it?
I hope some Wellington band will call themselves The Bomb Low after today #weatherbomb #wellingtonweather
@Hazelbird me toooo! Or at least her hairdresser on call ðŸ˜Š
LOVE this look https://t.co/zQjkG8OdjF
@Styla73 Also, it'll be interesting how it comes across to the weird Brits!
@Styla73 I'm assuming they'll do it all in American accents. West End Wicked doesn't and it's SO WEIRD because I know the OST by heart.
@Styla73 yay! Just came on to check if you managed to get some. I'm so jealous, but super happy for you!!!
Matilda was the 24th most popular name last year! I wonder if there'll be others in her class.
And no, I didn't only find it because I was looking for the baby name rankings for 2016...
The government has done something cool - this page is awesome, and would have been so helpful for us a year ago! https://t.co/GVJnRI6X97
@anniewisc this is exactly what it was like post-Brexit. And why politics isn't my thing.
When you realise you've got an avocado handprint on your boob 5 hours after lunch #mumlife
@Styla73 never mind, found your actual one! Alongside your Marbecks and CD and DVD Store addresses!
@Styla73 I only have your wedding RSVP address on here, so check that one!
@Styla73 I'll forward you my email, as I won't be using the code ðŸ˜Š
@Styla73 are you guys still in Europe when Hamilton opens? Did you get the presale code? The dates don't work for us ðŸ˜ž
All I could think was WHYYYY are they still printing and filing. https://t.co/MrPJuk0X7o
@Styla73 I think apples taste better cut up.
Oh my, Castle On The Hill makes me miss England. September can't come fast enough.
@zenbecca of course, can't have a double double without Timbits.
Watching a Canadian stream of the Globes. Please bring me a double double.
@Styla73 Neil just asked if, since it's a Take That musical, do they have to pick some shit singers ðŸ˜‚
@Styla73 definitely need dungarees! And milkmaid braids!
@Styla73 today's the first one! I love Mel. Did you watch Quiz of the Year?
@Styla73 oh don't worry, it's been on my GB radar for quite some time ðŸ˜
@Styla73 Gary Barlow is my absolute celeb crush. Only the DILF version, not the 90s Back For Good version.
Oh no. A package I forgot I'd ordered JUST showed up. Must stop.
New Years resolution: stop looking on the Boden baby website.
@Hazelbird @Styla73 all I could think was...boy doesn't know what to do without a guitar in his hands!
@anniewisc plenty of illegal audience recordings online for you to test that theory in the comfort of your own home for free ðŸ˜‰
Already smashing my 'eat more cheese' resolution.
@GreerBerry the whole of twitter was expecting an announcement of the queens death! It didn't happen.
@Hazelbird fingers crossed it's all rumours about nothing. Going to watch the BBC stream in 30 minutes, just in case.
@Hazelbird apparently announcement from the palace at 8am. But others saying it's nothing ðŸ˜ž
Have a very bad feeling about the next few hours. Not liking all these rumours swirling around.
And so, the Christmas engagement status updates begin...
Just heard the mixtape version of It's Quiet Uptown on the radio. Doesn't really make sense as a standalone song?
And yes, I love that show.
The guy from Million Dollar Listing NY is in New Zealand right now and his Insta stories is serious goals.
Thanks for my cute romper @Hazelbird! Perfect for this 30 degree day â¤ï¸ https://t.co/ToeQknIiMB
@Hazelbird oh he's heard, more than once.
@Hazelbird oh! And we saw him in a play with Judi Dench. I only married Neil because Ben is gay and married ðŸ˜‰
@Hazelbird I loved The Hour, he was so good in that. And Bond ðŸ˜Š
@Hazelbird oh my god Ben Whishaw is my number one. Didn't like London Spy because I prefer him with a posh accent ðŸ˜‰
@Styla73 ha! I just saw a blogger I follow wearing that.
My poor mum has broken her arm while walking the dog. It's a drastic way to get out of making the Christmas dinner.
Fabulous! Love this picture. https://t.co/33KgcJqHBX
Scotty Crowe just posted a video of JM and DRH and I feel like I'm at high school again.
The last paragraph in this article from the OED is perfect https://t.co/YXsSpLL36U
Usually I'm all 'they're just doing their job, they're on minimum wage, blah blah blah'. Not today. Not. Today.
@Hazelbird Absolutely never again. I'm being sent from pillar to post. They sold me a flight to Melbourne, now aren't flying there anymore.
You'd think getting a refund for a flight that no longer exists (but they were more than happy to take your money for) would be easy.
Do not know why I ever gave @Jetstar_NZ a chance. NEVER booking with them again.
Is it cool to like Coldplay? I never know. But their Christmas song has been a slow burner over the past few years, now I bloody love it.
@Hazelbird gosh I just read this news. How terrible. So young, I can't even imagine.
My goodness, does the queen know about these statements being released all over the show? https://t.co/NzE8noGS0U
Gimme alllll the Reformation x Haim collection please and thank you.
@devurrn 3 AND 4 on the same day?! That's not how Christmas works.
Matilda just laughed at her own fart and now I know she's my daughter.
@Styla73 @Hazelbird this is amazing. Oh to be a fly on the wall.
I'm sure more will come to me on the rewatch.
These are the things I loved: 1-Luke's speech in the kitchen 2-Rory's hair 3-Paris
These are the things I didn't like: 1-no theme song 2-the unnecessary length 3-the cheesy Insta filters over each episode #gilmoregirls
@awshucks79 yes, where the hell was the theme song?!? So annoying.
Finished. If anyone wants to talk about Luke's speech in the kitchen and the use of Reflecting Light again, I'll be over here sobbing.
Oh god, Jess. I still would. Always would. #GilmoreGirls
Not real coffee.
I feel so dirty, but I have a baby asleep in the car and I got a flat white from the McDonald's drive thru.
@awshucks79 yes definitely. It's left me with so many more questions!!
@awshucks79 not what I was expecting! I don't know what to think now.
I gave up and watched the last 5 minutes to hear the final 4 words. I wanted to spoil it for myself rather than have the Internet do it.
@Styla73 aw thanks. You can't have this one, but I'm sure any of your own would be just as cute/amenable to being dressed up.
@awshucks79 we gave up after one! Keeping away from the internet for the next 5 hours...
Oh my god a @Zoella name drop in the new Gilmore Girls.
It's like being wrapped in a cozy hug again #GilmoreGirls
Matilda's been waiting her whole life for this day gilmoregirls @netflix https://t.co/66AL68kICY
@awshucks79 I'm the opposite, going to have to drink A LOT of coffee. Released at 9 pm our time!
@Hazelbird didn't you give us the "you made a mini human" card? That was my fave.
I've made a lot of new mum friends this year. Ready to defriend any that plan on doing Elf on a Shelf.
The good and bad thing about weaning is being able to drink wine again.
@Styla73 I'm obsessed with them too! Every time one comes up I have to stop and watch them.
@Hazelbird We move on Wednesday! Have been there stripping wallpaper today.
However, our doorbell goes off without anyone touching it. If there's a ghost, can I return the house?
Our new neighbours have left a jar of cookies on our doorstep! I like this place.
Weirds me out to think Rory is now married to Pete Campbell and they have a baby.
@Styla73 that's exactly what I thought when I saw it!!!
@Styla73 the Australian from the Life and Death brigade. Annoys me that he's there!!
